name: canoeing
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the activity of travelling in a canoe (= a small, light, narrow boat, pointed at both ends): They died in a canoeing accident. In the summer I take my kids boating, rafting, and canoeing. See
canoe
Onfokus/E+/GettyImages
More examplesFewer examplesWe’d go on camping trips, set up our tent near a lake, and spend the days hiking and canoeing.Three of his favorite sports were cycling, hiking, and canoeing. My favourite activity during the trip was canoeing.
